field.name: image_ref
field.description: A reference to the image asset to use for widgets, sharing, seo.

field.name: bio
field.description: A short bio of the person. It should typically not have HTML as it is used in metadata, feeds, SERP and social.

field.name: bio_source
field.description: Indicates where the bio data originated from, e.g. imdb, freebase, custom.
